ygData.subject: Re: Hurrieta's Robe??
ygData.msgSnippet: Hurrieta Ironforge is who you mean. This quest has beffudled me a swell. When you give the tunic to Hurrieta herself she just thanks you, and that s it. No
ygData.messageBody:
Hurrieta Ironforge is who you mean. This quest
has beffudled me a swell. When you give the tunic to
Hurrieta herself she just thanks you, and that's it. No
exp, nothing. You can give it to the Ironforge's enemy
Ton Firepride. I'm not sure if you exp directly from
him, but I know that after that, you have to go see
the leader of the Bloodsabres, in the sewers or
something like that. Check Allakhazam's site for more
details.<br><a href=http://everquest.allakhazam.com target=new>http://everquest.allakhazam.com</a>
